morphInfos.tenseExplained: it happened‚ probably in the past
morphInfos.voiceExplained: it is something one does (similar to Active)
morphInfos.moodExplained: saying that an action might or could happen
morphInfos.personExplained: they are the person being spoken or written to
morphInfos.numberExplained: there is only one of them
morphInfos.explanation: an action that maybe happened – by a person being spoken or written to
